item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Xizhi Zhu, also known as Steven. I’m a Christian, husband, father, son, and somehow also a software engineer. Some more I was born and brought up in China ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡³. After college, I moved to Finland ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡® and lived there for nine years. Currently, I live in the United States ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸. Professionally, I’ve been a software engineer for over 10 years, with experiences in established and well-known companies, as well as fast-growing start-ups.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: We collect, store, and use your information in connection with our products and services according to this Privacy Policy. By using our products or services, you signify the acceptance of this Privacy Policy. We will not, under any circumstances, give out or sell your personal information to any third parties, nor do we store any information about your usage of our products or services other than to analyze and optimize our products and services.
